snippet: Easter markets in Prague can will fill many of the city's public squares through April 15. They can be found in just about every city borough, including Old Town Square as well as the popular Vinohrady and Zizkov neighborhoods.
abstract: Easter markets in Prague can will fill many of the city's public squares through April 15. They can be found in just about every city borough, including Old Town Square as well as the popular Vinohrady and Zizkov neighborhoods.

headline.main: Sampling the Easter Markets of Prague
